@chri55w wrote:

basically what it appears you have done is mixed up the coordinates i have created an image showing the 2 sections that appear to be causing you a problem, to me it looks like youve mixed up your x coords and y coords take another look at the coords for those 2 and let me know if it works

item.title: [PI]Areas
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

Ok, well i’ve been working on a custom dungeoneering system and, while a player is in dungeoneering they cannot use/activate prayer and when they die, they do not lose items and re-spawn back in a certain place. Here’s the area’s I need to be like that:

public boolean inDungeoneering() { if(absX >= 2448 && absX <= 2484 && absY >= 4761 && absY <= 4796 || absX >= 3064 && absX <= 9869 && absY >= 3090 && absY <= 9904 || absX >= 3358 && absX <= 3393 && absY >= 9798 && absY <= 9831 || absX >= 2755 && absX <= 9179 && absY >= 2779 && absY <= 9212 || absX >= 3158 && absX <= 3185 && absY >= 9871 && absY <= 9901) { return true; } return false; }
It works if I delete 4/5 area’s leaving only one. If I leave it as is, a player cannot use prayer anywhere, and they cannot lose items on death anywhere.
Anyone know why?..

Read full topic
